casebody.data:
No. 10-9854. Jonathon Terrell Patterson, and Thomas Joseph Isbell, Petitioners v. United States. 563 U.S. 982, 131 S. Ct. 2893,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1202,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3525. May 2, 2011.

Petition for writ of certio-rari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 406 Fed. Appx. 773.
